headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid TXT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Textron’s shares have sunk to $73.65, producing a disappointing 15.3% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
